duties_responsibilities.duty: Deploy and maintain security infrastructure and processes with focus on infrastructure, end-point protection, email & application security, mobile security, and identity and access management.
Collaborate with Organization's Technology Services - IT Operations and other Business Unit teams to ensure adequate security solutions are in place.
Participate in the evaluation and acquisition of security products and services.
Participate in effective communication between security engineering, security operations, 'GRC', and other IT departments and business units.
Assist with response and remediation efforts to internal and external security audits.
Participate in post-mortem investigation of security incidents, and prepare reports documenting the findings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
